query.name: findByPK
query.sql: SELECT * FROM SECTION WHERE SECTION_ID = ?

query.name: findAll
query.sql: SELECT * FROM SECTION

query.name: create
query.sql: INSERT INTO SECTION (CRF_VERSION_ID, STATUS_ID, LABEL, TITLE, INSTRUCTIONS, SUBTITLE, PAGE_NUMBER_LABEL, ORDINAL, PARENT_ID, OWNER_ID, DATE_CREATED,BORDERS) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,NOW(),?)

query.name: update
query.sql: UPDATE SECTION SET CRF_VERSION_ID=?,STATUS_ID=?,LABEL=?, TITLE=?,INSTRUCTIONS=?,SUBTITLE=?,PAGE_NUMBER_LABEL=?,ORDINAL=?, DATE_UPDATED=NOW(),UPDATE_ID=?,BORDERS=? WHERE SECTION_ID=?

query.name: findByVersionId
query.sql: SELECT * FROM SECTION WHERE CRF_VERSION_ID=? order by section_id ASC

query.name: findByLayoutId
query.sql: SELECT * FROM SECTION s,versioning_map vm WHERE vm.form_layout_id=? AND vm.crf_version_id=s.crf_version_id limit 1

query.name: findAllByCRFVersion
query.sql: SELECT * FROM section WHERE crf_version_id=? order by section_id ASC

query.name: getNumItemsBySectionId
query.sql: SELECT section_id, count(*) as num_items FROM ITEM_FORM_METADATA M GROUP BY section_id

query.name: getNumItemsPlusRepeatBySectionId
query.sql: SELECT M.section_id as section_id, count(*) AS num_items FROM ITEM_DATA D, ITEM_FORM_METADATA M WHERE D.item_id = M.item_id AND (D.status_id != 5 AND D.status_id != 7) AND D.event_crf_id = ? GROUP BY M.section_id

query.name: getNumItemsCompletedBySectionId
query.sql: SELECT M.section_id as section_id, count(*) AS num_items FROM ITEM_DATA D, ITEM_FORM_METADATA M WHERE D.item_id = M.item_id AND D.status_id = 2 AND D.event_crf_id = ? GROUP BY M.section_id

query.name: getNumItemsCompletedBySection
query.sql: SELECT M.section_id as section_id, count(*) AS num_items FROM ITEM_DATA D, ITEM_FORM_METADATA M WHERE D.item_id = M.item_id --AND D.status_id = 2 AND D.event_crf_id = ? GROUP BY M.section_id

query.name: getNumItemsPendingBySectionId
query.sql: SELECT M.section_id as section_id, count(*) AS num_items FROM ITEM_DATA D, ITEM_FORM_METADATA M WHERE D.item_id = M.item_id AND D.status_id = 4 AND D.event_crf_id = ? GROUP BY M.section_id

query.name: getNumItemsBlankBySectionId
query.sql: SELECT M.section_id as section_id, count(*) AS num_items FROM ITEM_DATA D, ITEM_FORM_METADATA M WHERE D.item_id = M.item_id AND D.status_id = 1 AND D.event_crf_id = ? GROUP BY M.section_id

query.name: getNumItemsBySection
query.sql: SELECT M.section_id as section_id, count(*) AS num_items FROM ITEM_DATA D, ITEM_FORM_METADATA M WHERE D.item_id = M.item_id AND D.status_id = 1 AND D.event_crf_id = ? AND M.section_id = ? GROUP BY M.section_id

query.name: getNumItemsPendingBySection
query.sql: SELECT M.section_id as section_id, count(*) AS num_items FROM ITEM_DATA D, ITEM_FORM_METADATA M WHERE D.item_id = M.item_id --AND D.status_id = 4 AND D.event_crf_id = ? AND M.section_id = ? GROUP BY M.section_id

query.name: getNumItemsBlankBySection
query.sql: SELECT M.section_id as section_id, count(*) AS num_items FROM ITEM_DATA D, ITEM_FORM_METADATA M WHERE D.item_id = M.item_id AND D.status_id = 1 AND D.event_crf_id = ? AND M.section_id = ? GROUP BY M.section_id

query.name: findNext
query.sql: SELECT n.* FROM section n, section c WHERE n.crf_version_id = c.crf_version_id AND n.ordinal = c.ordinal + 1 AND c.crf_version_id = ? AND c.ordinal = ?

query.name: findPrevious
query.sql: SELECT n.* FROM section n, section c WHERE n.crf_version_id = c.crf_version_id AND n.ordinal = c.ordinal - 1 AND c.crf_version_id = ? AND c.ordinal = ?

query.name: deleteTestSection
query.sql: delete from section where label=?

query.name: countSCDItemBySectionId
containNormalItem
query.sql: select ifm.item_id from item_form_metadata ifm where ifm.section_id = ? and ifm.crf_version_id = ? and ifm.show_item = 't' and ifm.item_id not in (select distinct igm.item_id from item_group_metadata igm where igm.crf_version_id = ? and igm.show_group = 'f' and igm.item_id in (select im.item_id from item_form_metadata im where im.section_id = ? and im.crf_version_id = ?)) limit 1

query.name: getSectionIdForTabId
query.sql: select section_id from section where crf_version_id = ? and ordinal = ?
